welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saffron Walden, a charming and historic market town in the heart of the English countryside known for its picturesque streets and beautiful medieval buildings. Enjoy your stay and be sure to explore all that our town has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles all flights and is equipped with various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is connected to the main terminal and is used for overflow flights and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Stansted Airport caters to VIP and business travelers, providing exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cambridge Airport caters to executive and VIP flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport is a smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
